metadata.title: CVE-2020-14201 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr CRM before 11.0.5 allows privilege escalation. This could allowremote authenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files viasociete/document.php in which "disabled" is changed to "enabled" in theHTML source code.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
